issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

comments.body:
Here's the test Standard Output:

2012-09-12 03:45:39,692 INFO  datanode.DataNode (SimulatedFSDataset.java:registerMBean(881)) - Registered FSDatasetState MBean
